name: The Family Pendant
description:
This classic family pendant is an heirloom piece that has been designed to tell the story of your family.  Its clean and simple design is complemented with classic script hand engraving.  The bail allows the pendant to spin freely creating movement and interest to the piece.

A maximum of 35 characters (including spaces) can be engraved on the front.  The back of this pendant can also be engraved.  Please contact us for a quote if you also wish to have engraving on the back.

The pendant is complemented with the finest sterling silver curb chain. The 45 cm chain is fitted with a parrot clasp to provide an elegant finish. The 2.1mm wide chain provides a perfectly balanced look to the pendant 

Pendant Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Outer diameter: 35 mm
Thickness: 2.5 mm
Finished weight: 13.6 grams

Chain Specifications 
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925 
Width: 2.1 mm 
Finished weight: 5.7 grams

options.name: Family Pendant

name: The Large Family Pendant
description:
This large family pendant is a statement piece that has been designed and handcrafted to provide plenty of space for longer names or larger families.

Its classic and elegant design makes it a pendant that can be worn on all occasions.  Milled solid sterling silver has been used to provide the highest quality finish and polish.  

A maximum of 45 characters (including spaces) can be engraved on the front.  Should you also require extra engraving on the back please contact us for a quote.

The pendant is complemented with the finest sterling silver curb chain. The 45 cm chain is fitted with a parrot clasp to provide an elegant finish. The 2.1mm wide chain provides a perfectly balanced look to the pendant 

Pendant Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Outer diameter: 42 mm
Thickness: 2.5 mm
Finished weight: 16.5 grams

Chain Specifications 
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925 
Width: 2.1 mm 
Finished weight: 5.7 grams

options.name: The Large Family Pendant

name: The Message Pendant
description:
This message pendant is a 'blank canvas' upon which you can have a special hand engraved message.  It may be an inspirational quote, names of loved ones or even a date.  The pendant in the photo features the French phrase "True friendship lasts a lifetime".  You are only limited by your imagination! 

This handcrafted item is manufactured in solid milled sterling silver.  The hand set premium Swarovski cubic zirconia finishes this piece beautifully.  Should you wish to have a round brilliant diamond or alternative gemstone set into this piece please contact us for a quote.

This pendant is also available with a bail that is identical to The Family Pendant. 

A maximum of 33 characters including spaces can be engraved onto this pendant.  

The pendant is complemented by a 45cm black twisted satin necklace with 6cm extension chain. Alternatively, the pendant can be worn with a 2.1mm round curb chain which can be purchased separately.

Product Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Outer diameter: 35 mm
Thickness: 2.5 mm
Finished weight: 13.6 grams

name: The Identity Bangle
description:
A delicate design with a fresh vintage appeal.  This is a magnificent handcrafted bangle that will be treasured and passed down as a true heirloom. The finished weight of this piece bestows upon the wearer a feeling of luxury and quality.  A classic hand engraved floral design is beautifully set with your choice of birthstone.  This bangle is a wonderful gift for a birthday, graduation or any other special occasion.
Premium Swarovski cubic zirconia is used for the birth month of April.  Alternatively, if you would like round brilliant diamonds please contact us for a quote.

When ordering this piece please specify in the notes box during checkout the name to be engraved and the birth month.

Should you require a custom size made for you please contact us.  

Product Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Birthstone Size: Round 3mm
Profile: Half Round
Diameter: Small 60mm  Medium 65mm  Large 70mm
Finished Weight: 
Small 37.5 grams  Medium 40.5 grams  Large 44.0 grams

options.name: Small - 60mm diameter
Medium - 65mm diameter
Large - 70mm diameter

name: The Petra Bangle
description:
The Petra Bangle adorns your wrist with a unique presence.  It combines classic hand engraved script with the contemporary finish of hand set birthstones. This style is ideal for those who prefer a minimalistic look. The weight and shape of this piece makes it comfortable to wear and can be worn for any occasion.

The maximum number of names can be engraved on the following sizes:

Small Bangle: Five names and birthstones
Medium Bangle: Six names and birthstones 
Large Bangle: Seven names and birthstones

Engraving can be spaced out evenly or clustered together. Please specify your preference in the notes box during checkout.

Should you require a custom size made for you please contact us.  


Product Specifications 
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925 
Birthstone Size: Round 3mm 
Profile: Half Round 
Diameter: Small 60mm Medium 65mm Large 70mm 
Finished Weight: 
Small 37.5 grams Medium 40.5 grams Large 44.0 grams

Swarovski crystal is used for the birth month of April. If you would like a round brilliant diamond please contact us.

name: The Fleur Bangle
description:
This bangle is an heirloom piece that will tell your story with beauty and tenderness.  The graceful floral bud design has been hand set with premium quality birthstones and is complemented with classic script hand engraving.

The unsurpassable quality and weight of the Fleur Bangle makes it a piece to be treasured for more than a lifetime.

The number of names can be engraved on the following sizes:

Small Bangle: Four names and flower motifs
Medium Bangle: Five names and flower motifs
Large Bangle: Six names and flower motifs

Engraving can be spaced out evenly or clustered together.  Please specify your preference in the notes box during checkout.

Should you require a custom size made for you please contact us.  

Product Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Birthstone Size: Round 3mm
Profile: Half Round
Diameter: Small 60mm  Medium 65mm  Large 70mm
Finished Weight: 
Small 37.5 grams  Medium 40.5 grams  Large 44.0 grams

Premium Swarovski cubic zirconia is used for the birth month of April.  Alternatively, if you would like round brilliant diamonds please contact us for a quote.

name: Leather Personalised Cuff
description:
This leather cuff is handcrafted from premium quality cowhide by one of Australia's finest leathersmiths.  It features a personalised hand engraved sterling silver loop that has been designed to celebrate a special event in your life.

This cuff features a double buckle fastening which gives a contemporary fashion-forward look.  It can be worn at 5 different size circumferences - 18cm, 19cm, 20cm, 21cm and 22cm.

Should you require a custom size please contact us.

It is available in two colours: 

Dark brown with black trim, or Black.

A maximum of 9 characters can be engraved on each side of the loop.

Cuff Specifications
Material: Premium Cowhide and silver metal buckles
Width: 48mm
Sizing:  Adjustable between 18cm and 22cm circumference.

Loop Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Outer diameter: 28 mm
Thickness: 2.5 mm
Finished weight: 9.8 grams

name: Sterling Silver Curb Round Chain
description:
To complement our pendant range we have selected the finest sterling silver curb round chain. The chain is fitted with a parrot clasp to provide an elegant finish.  The 2.1mm wide chain provides a perfectly balanced look to our Family and Large Family pendants.

Our chain is available in the universal length of 45cm.  Should you wish to have a custom length created to suit, please contact us.

Product Specifications
Material: Solid Sterling Silver 925
Width: 2.1 mm
Finished weight: 5.7 grams

options.name: 45 cm round curb chain 2.1 mm wide

name: Twisted Silk Black Necklace
description:
This beautiful silk necklace can be worn with all Heirloom pendants.  This 45cm long necklace also features a sterling silver fish lock clasp and 6cm extension chain.

Product Specifications
Material: Silk and Sterling Silver 925
Thickness: 3mm
Length: 45cm
